Title: Verify login with valid credentials
Steps: 1) Go to login > 2) Enter username 'standard_user' > 3) Enter 'secret_sauce' > 4) Click Login

Steps: 1) Go to login > 2) Enter 'standard_user' > 3) Enter 'wrongpass' > 4) Click Login
Expected Result: Error shown; user stays on login

Title: Verify locked out user cannot login
Steps: 1) Go to login > 2) Enter 'locked_out_user' > 3) Enter 'secret_sauce' > 4) Click Login

Steps: 1) Leave both fields empty > 2) Click Login
